thread.title: Name Jeremy batty Barmouth
thread.title_full: Artifolk reviewed by Name Jeremy batty Barmouth

author: Name Jeremy batty Barmouth
title: Name Jeremy batty Barmouth
text: Artifolk has good prices, excellent stock of art items.The only place that seems to have the full range of Faber Castell Durer watercolour pencils, correctly shown with FC reference numbers. Site is easy to use,quick delivery,well packed.Long may they continue. Thank you.
